name: DART Asteroid Impact
description:
A simulation of the last 15 seconds of NASA's mission to smash a space probe into an asteroid. At 6700m/s, that's the time it takes to go the last 100km!

I wanted to see what it would look like from the probe as it crashed into the asteroid, and also a fun way to teach myself a bit about the Unity game engine.

After impact the simulation loops back to the start so you can watch multiple times.
